message: I'm feeling generous.  Let's start fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but I'm sure you'll have your chance later on.
You were generous, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of. I'll start with a more balanced offer.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split the difference from your last offer and move forward.
You're trying to split the difference, but I think I can do better than that. Let's meet in the middle this time.
